column5: Although not as popular name wise as some of the other greats weve lost, who he played skins for namely  CSNY  on both there firstt album, and also Deja Vu which came out in 73, Dallas also played for the Paul Butterfield band tour, and then went 180 degrees in the opposite direction and became a anti-drug, and alcohol influential speaker
Also guy from band Mott the Hoople . David Bowie wrote  most famous song All the young Dudes.
Dallas Taylor died in January of 2015
Good old Wolfe station in Peterborough a year behind the times,    Dallas passed away Jan 18th 2015  acc Wikapedia
